events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this is not what I paid for.
The customer issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the report of a wrong item received.
Assigning the case to a customer service agent specialized in refunds to handle the claim efficiently.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received along with your order number to proceed with the refund?
Here is a photo of the item I got and my order number is 1234567. Please let me know what happens next.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately and you should see the funds back in your account within 5-7 business days.
Thank you for the quick response and for processing the refund. I appreciate your assistance in resolving this quickly.
I have confirmed that your refund has been processed. If you need any further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Just following up to ensure you received your refund successfully and everything is now satisfactory with your order.
Closing this case as the refund was completed and confirmed by the customer with no further issues reported.
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey to gather your feedback about this support experience.
